page.title: 17Recreation Facilities
page.content: Schools supply many facilities such as gymnasia, swimming pools and playing fields. These are not only used by the schools but also by scouts, adventure groups, church and other clubs and societies. Local parks provide extra amenities, especially for young children, such as swings and roundabouts as well as extra sports pitches. In addition to the watersports at Fairlands Valley there are very good venues for athletics at Ridlins End and the Borough Council have built a municipal golf course at the S.E. end of the town.
